meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Stiff</kanji> <kanji>freight</kanji> always has to be paid for in <vocabulary>coin</vocabulary>s, because coins are also stiff. You can't go paying for something stiff with something not stiff, that would make no sense at all.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
